original: Anderson, Sven Ivar, fabrikör, Borås, f. 16/11/02 i Borås av fabr. Claes A. o. Hanna Johansson. G. 35 m. Gunhild Lindqvist. Barn: Kerstin f. 37, Claes-Göran 41. — Stud. v. Borås h. a. 1. o. v. Borås tekn. vävsk. 12-27. Textilstud. i USA 22-24 o. 27-30. Grund. o. innehar firma Allmogevävnader Sven Andersson i Borås sed. 30. Medl. av W-Sex o. Odd Fellow. Hobbies: jakt o. fiske.
translated: Anderson, Sven Ivar, manufacturer, Borås, born on November 16, 1902 in Borås to manufacturer Claes A. and Hanna Johansson. Married to Gunhild Lindqvist since 1935. Children: Kerstin (born 1937) and Claes-Göran (born 1941). Studied at Borås secondary school and Borås Technical Weaving School from 1912 to 1927. Studied textile production in the USA from 1922 to 1924 and from 1927 to 1930. Founded and manages the company Allmogevävnader Sven Andersson in Borås since 1930. Member of W-Sex and Odd Fellow. Hobbies are hunting and fishing.

education.name: Textile Production Studies in the USA
Textile Production Studies in the USA
